services.title: Talent Acquisition
services.tex: We heavily rely on our rich and diverse talent pool to ensure we deliver effective staffing as well as the recruitment solutions for our clients. In...
services.text: We heavily rely on our rich and diverse experience to leverage our talent pool to ensure we deliver effective staffing as well as the recruitment solutions for our clients. In this sense, we find the best skills and fit for our clients. We take the steps to help you zero in and acquire the very best on the market.

services.title: Executive Search
services.text: We can be your partner to help in attracting the leading executives who outperform your expectations. Ou framework is built to assess how an executive vision pairs with your company culture to achieve generational growth.

subServices.title: Retained Search
subServices.text: We built retained search through collaborating, listening and precise communication. We draw directly from our talent pool depending on your needs whether you are seeking enterprise solutions like SAP, Oracle or in need of unique disparate skills.

subServices.title: Corporate Staffing
subServices.text: While we’ve long recruited tech positions and teams for diverse markets, we do more than IT staffing. We also recruit top managers for you—Senior Managers, Directors, and VPs. You can trust us to secure the People that Power your Business.

subServices.title: Contingency Search
subServices.text: From corporate functions to supervisors and management-level positions, you’ll benefit from our deep candidate research and highly-qualified pool of top talent. We find A+ candidates to fill your toughest roles fast, and only get compensated when ours are hired.

services.title: Recruiting Process Outsourcing (RPO)
services.text: Positioning for Performance and Growth. Whether you need to hand off some or all of your recruiting process, our RPO experts can seamlessly integrate with your internal resources to build on and build out their effort.

subServices.title: Urgent Demand Staffing
subServices.text: We take ownership of your recruiting process by bringing people, technology, and processes together to efficiently meet project demands. Our RPO teams are true experts who closely manage your project. We are SCRUM, PMP and SHRM certified as well as Data Analytics Masters.

subServices.title: Project Staffing
subServices.text: We bring right candidates on board when needed, as needed to make progress happen for your company when you need to ramp up staff. We make staff augmentation easy so projects can be completed on-time and on-budget.

subServices.title: Our RPO combines the following Three Pillars
subServices.text: The key pillars that make our RPO successful are;

subnServices.title: People
subnServices.text: Once your needs ae understood, we select our human resources who will direct your recruiting. We optimize the number of people at every level to meet your needs and increase exponentially.

subnServices.title: Platform
subnServices.text: Client HR departments and C-level executives appreciate how our RPO projects deliver what we call “scalable candidates”, talent whose subject matter expertise mean one person can fill two positions or more.

subnServices.title: Process
subnServices.text: SeasPark runs RPO projects basing on Urgent demand staff model for both our clients by assembling the correct personnel for your needs, and many clients have benefitted from our methodical approach.

services.text: Our Digital Business Services is ready to help you build, succeed as an Intelligent Enterprise and accelerate faster value creation with greater visibility, focus and agility.

services.title: Implementation end to end SAP Projects
services.text: Our Implementation Services portfolio assists organizations in business transformation initiatives. Our blend of industry best practices, proven implementation methodologies, and modern configuration tools can enable you to fast-track the deployment of your SAP ERP solution.

subServices.title: Typical implementation engagement cover is achieved through;

subnServices.text: Implementation Project Plan and monitor the execution, configure and test the underlying technical infrastructure.
Define, design, map and configure business processes and customize business processes if needed
Perform Change Management through effective Knowledge Transfer and end user education programs

subServices.title: Roll Out
subServices.text: Roll out typically involves;

services.title: SAP Upgrade and migration – your choice SAP upgrade
services.text: If you’re planning to upgrade to the latest version of your SAP platform, you can partner with us to help you flawlessly upgrade your SAP system on a predictable timeline and budget and with minimal business disruption. Upgrade and Migration capabilities include Upgrade implementation plan, Deployment of environment, Migration, System testing, new system adaptability, post go live support. We also help in our customers moving to Cloud deployment which helps to lower total cost of ownership, and the convenience of outsourcing maintenance, support, and upgrades.

services.title: SAP roll out – We make your ERP work
services.text: SeasPark Consultancy has extensive experience in Template solutions rollout for different clients across their business units and geographies. We offer multiple delivery models wherein we can align your specific business processes, systems and strategies for achieving your business objectives. Apart from this, our ready to use SAP roll-out guidelines, standards and procedures help you accelerate the roll out process and speed up the business operations. This rollout includes;

subServices.text: Process mapping country extensions
Process mapping country extensions
Configuring country extensions
Custom developments for country extensions
Deployment through change management

services.text: The easy-to-use services provide you with the most qualified SAP consultants to help you with your specific SAP projects. The scope includes – Immediate access to highly skilled independent consultants across all SAP modules and sub-modules; Online and/or on-site available consulting support.

services.title: SAP Business Solutions
services.text: SeasPark offers strategic consulting expertise in areas like enterprise application support, custom application development, and cutting-edge technologies such as cloud, voice interfaces, and IoT.

services.title: ERP Solutions
services.text: ERP systems are considered to be the backbone of the business information management as it establishes a measurable platform for business growth. The system also provides real-time reporting of everything that happens in the business process, significantly reducing the risk of data duplication and enhancing inter-departmental collaboration. At SeasPark Consultancy, we offer the following ERP Solutions;

subServices.title: At SeasPark Consultancy, we offer the following ERP Solutions;
SAP ECC
text: SAP ECC (ERP Central component) is the core of existing SAP Business suite, which has SAP ECC, SAP CRM, SAP SRM, SAP SCM, and SAP PLM. SAP business suite can run on any DB (Oracle, MSSQL, IBM DB2) including HANA. We provide full life cycle services for the design, building, testing and implementation of SAP solutions for a new ECC 6 implementation.

subServices.title: S4HANA
subServices.text: SAP S4HANA is deployable on premise or cloud and provides customers with real-time analysis by processing copious amounts of data. This not only quickens the business process but also delivers more business intelligence and simplifies the IT environment drastically.

subServices.title: SAP Business One
subServices.text: SAP Business ByDesign is an affordable, easy-to-use cloud ERP solution for fast-growing businesses. With Business ByDesign, you can manage your entire business—including financials, human resources, customer relationship management (CRM), procurement, projects, and the supply chain—from a single, unified solution. Business ByDesign easily adapts to how you do business—not the other way around—and grows with your organization using various solution extensions. As you explore software, evaluate products that offer the features you need now—and the ones you expect to need later.  SAP Business ByDesign likely has the right functionalities at the right price.

services.title: SAP Business ByDesign
services.text: SAP Business ByDesign is an affordable, easy-to-use cloud ERP solution for fast-growing businesses. With Business ByDesign, you can manage your entire business—including financials, human resources, customer relationship management (CRM), procurement, projects, and the supply chain—from a single, unified solution. Business ByDesign easily adapts to how you do business—not the other way around—and grows with your organization using various solution extensions. With rapid implementation and quarterly updates that don’t interfere with operations, you can focus on strategy, innovation, and growth. And because Business ByDesign features APIs that allow easy integrations with custom solutions and pre-built connections, you’ll save time by eliminating repetitive data entry. The true value of SAP Business ByDesign for your growing business is that it’s extremely powerful but also easy to use. As you explore software, evaluate products that offer the features you need now—and the ones you expect to need later.  SAP Business ByDesign likely has the right functionalities at the right price.

subServices.title: SAP Business ByDesign Features
text: SAP Business ByDesign delivers pre-built processes for all your core business areas. These processes are based on best practices from thousands of companies like yours, allowing you to seize opportunities to accelerate growth. With this robust ERP solution, you can compete with businesses of all sizes—without the complexity and cost.

subServices.title: SAP Business ByDesign for Finance
text: Assess your financial performance in real-time, streamline your core accounting tasks, and get a handle on cash management and liquidity with Business ByDesign. Financial and managerial accounting: Manage accounts for multiple operating units, currencies, and reporting standards. Cash flow management: Use customer and supplier transaction data to get real-time visibility into your cash position.

subServices.title: SAP Business ByDesign for CRM
text: Manage your marketing and sales activities and provide stellar customer service with Business ByDesign.  Marketing: Leverage personalized customer information for more meaningful campaigns, lead generation and qualification, and sales team handovers.  Sales: Automate the sales process and improve account management, from contact interactions to invoicing. Service: Give your employees the tools and insights they need to deliver world-class service and delight customers.

services.title: SAP Business ByDesign for Localization
services.text: Business ByDesign supports businesses with international locations and operations. If your business operates across countries, SAP Business ByDesign allows multiple companies in multiple countries with multiple sets of books to reside in the same system simultaneously.

services.title: Digital Platforms
services.text: Let SeasPark’s technologists guide you through a process of planning, building, and delivering technology solutions tailored to solve your unique business challenges. Digital Strategy Development: We help you define and refine your digital strategy to align with your business objectives, ensuring that your technology investments yield maximum returns. Digital Transformation: Our experts assist you in transforming your business processes and operations through the adoption of digital technologies, enhancing efficiency and competitiveness. Data Analytics and Business Intelligence: We help you harness the power of data by implementing analytics and BI solutions that provide actionable insights for informed decision-making.

services.title: Trainings
services.text: Explore a world beyond IT staffing. SeasPark excels in recruiting Senior Managers, Directors, and VPs, ensuring your organization is powered by leaders who drive business success.
We offer tailored leadership development programs designed to enhance the skills and capabilities of your senior managers, directors, and VPs, empowering them to drive business success.

subServices.title: Leadership Development Programs:
subServices.text: We offer tailored leadership development programs designed to enhance the skills and capabilities of your senior managers, directors, and VPs, empowering them to drive business success.

subServices.title: Management Training Workshops:
subServices.text: Our interactive management training workshops cover a wide range of topics, including strategic planning, team management, and effective decision-making, equipping your leaders with the tools they need to excel.

subServices.title: Executive Coaching Services:
subServices.text: Our experienced executive coaches provide one-on-one coaching sessions to help your senior leaders enhance their leadership skills, overcome challenges, and achieve their professional goals.

subServices.title: Succession Planning:
subServices.text: We assist you in developing and implementing succession plans to ensure a smooth transition of leadership roles within your organization, minimizing disruptions and maintaining continuity.

subServices.title: Leadership Assessments:
subServices.text: We conduct comprehensive leadership assessments to identify strengths, areas for improvement, and development opportunities for your senior managers, directors, and VPs

subServices.title: Customized Training Solutions:
subServices.text: We tailor our training programs to meet your organization's specific needs and objectives, ensuring that the content is relevant, engaging, and impactful.

subServices.title: Industry-specific Training Programs:
subServices.text: We offer industry-specific training programs that address the unique challenges and opportunities faced by your organization, keeping your leaders abreast of the latest trends and best practices.

subServices.title: Team Building Activities:
subServices.text: We organize team building activities and workshops to foster collaboration, communication, and trust among your senior management team, enhancing team cohesion and performance.

subServices.title: Soft Skills Training:
subServices.text: We provide training in essential soft skills such as communication, leadership, and emotional intelligence, enabling your leaders to effectively manage teams and drive results.

subServices.title: Continuous Learning Programs:
subServices.text: We promote a culture of continuous learning and development within your organization, offering ongoing training programs to keep your senior managers, directors, and VPs updated with the latest industry trends and practices.

services.title: Data & Analytics
services.text: Our Data & Analytics solutions helps your business improve data analysis so you can make better decisions and react to opportunities and threats quickly. A strategic approach to analytics will provide the key to unlocking the value in your data – enabling you to gain unprecedented insights, bridge the gap between analysis and business outcomes, and combine the power of big data with analytics to drive business success.

services.title: Business Intelligence
services.text: Our solutions can help you take the guesswork out by allowing you to monitor key metrics, and make actionable information available to users.

subServices.title: SAP Business Warehouse (BW)
text: Empower your people with 24/7 access to the BI and data analysis tools they need to make faster, more informed decisions. We offer SAP BW, SAP BW on HANA and SAP BW/4HANA solutions which are BI platforms equipped with a suite of tools to deliver data warehousing, analysis, and reporting to empower management decision making. We provide end-to-end services

subServices.title: SAP Business Objects
subServices.text: This is an Enterprise BI Reporting using SAP Business Objects. Our expertise in SAP Business Objects covers strategy, implementation & management. • We have expertise in in integrating SAP Business Objects with the overall SAP BI landscape – especially with SAP BW & SAP HANA. • Administration • Setup, Configuration, Migration & Upgrades • Enterprise Reporting • Universe Design, Web Intelligence, Crystal Reports & Analysis for Office, Lumira • SAP BI Integration With SAP BW (on HANA & BW4HANA), ECC, and SAP HANA & Business Objects Cloud.

subServices.title: SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC).
subServices.text: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model. • End-to-end analytics on the Cloud. • Prior expertise in deploying data warehousing, reporting & analytics on the cloud. • Cloud BI & Analytics. • Hybrid On-Premise + Cloud BI. • Integrate your cloud platforms with existing on-premise investments and enhance ROI. • SAP Tools & Platforms.
